grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 厘【リン】one-hundredth, 0.3 mm (one-hundredth of a sun), 0.1 percent (one-hundredth of a wari), 0.0375 grams (one-hundredth of a monme), old monetary unit (0.001 yen)
九分九厘【クブクリン】ten to one, nine cases out of ten
一分一厘【イチブイチリン】(not even) a bit of, (not even) a hint of, (not) an iota of
